Create datasets
```{r}
# n=number of ballots, pT = true proportion of votes to the first candidate, 
# create a vector of samples
tc_create_data <- function(n, pT, winner, loser){
  Yn = c(rep(0, round((1-pT)*n)), rep(1, round(pT*n))) 
  Yn = ifelse(Yn==1, winner, loser)
  return (Yn)
}  
```

Find true winner and losers from a dataset
```{r}
# Find true winner between two candidates
tcfind_winner = function(data){
  votes = table(data)
  if (votes[1] > votes[2]){
    return (names(votes)[1])
  } else {
    return (names(votes)[2])
  }
}

# Find true loser between two candidates
tcfind_loser = function(data){
  votes = table(data)
  if (votes[1] < votes[2]){
    return (names(votes)[1])
  } else {
    return (names(votes)[2])
  }
}
```
